abstract: Organizers of 2020 Tokyo Olympics suggest addition of baseball and karate, which are popular in Japan, as well as sports climbing, surfing and skateboarding, which have youth appeal, for inclusion in Summer Games.
lead_paragraph: Organizers made sure to include baseball and karate because they are important to Japan, in addition to surfing, skateboarding and sports climbing, which meet the International Olympic Committee’s call that additional sports have a strong youth appeal.

headline.main: With Eye to Home Fans and Youths, Tokyo Suggests Adding Five Olympic Sports in 2020
headline.print_headline: Five Sports Suggested for Games in Tokyo
